messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Hello crew lets have a SAFE and PRODUCTIVE shift! For the glory of nanostrasen!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: We need the SM engine up and running anyone who knows how to set it up help the AI

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: All assistants are to get toolbelts and get to work on the engine or I'm gulaging you. If you think you're exempt, tell me so.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Fuck the gulag you'll be executed if the engine isn't set up in a timely manner

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ALL THE OTHER KIDSSS WITH THE PUMPED UP KICKSSS

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Eli Norton is the only one setting up the SM assistants are to be gathered up and executed and Eli is to report to me in my office

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Chh'ooolddd i joosttt  cahl'l thhe  shoottttle?
